metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43618 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: GNU Multiple Precision Arithmetic Library (GMP) through 6.2.1 has an mpz/inp_raw.c integer overflow and resultant buffer overflow via crafted input, leading to a segmentation fault on 32-bit platforms.

notes.Note: sbeattie> reproducer in debian bug report

criterions.comment: gmp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
